Language code of the search expression (if null, en-us is used)

member.summary: Gets the double replacer regular expression.

member.summary: Returns string representation of the double value. Returned value has always uniform format.

member.summary: Converts search string to the integer value.

member.summary: Returns string representation of the decimal value.

member.summary: Converts search string to the decimal value.

member.summary: Converts the string representation of the date time from searched document to a date time
